programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Tamara takes on a 1979 property with a confusing style. She opens up sight lines by removing soffits in the living room and kitchen, and she pulls out the midcentury modern design with elements like shiplap and brass.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Tamara tackles a 1952 Traditional home with a massive open concept living space. She triples the size of the mudroom and chooses a stunning surround for the living room fireplace. Later, Tamara and her dad race to find the perfect dining table.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Tamara renovates an '80s home in need of some TLC by adding her unique style to the front and back yards. Then, she removes dated elements throughout the house and creates a breathtaking kitchen and main suite bathroom.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: A baking aficionado and her husband want to convert their dark, oddly constructed home into a bright and welcoming space for them and their kids.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: After seeing overhaul they did on her parent's house, a woman moving back to Bentonville knows that Dave and Jenny can create her dream home, too. The Marrs use her love of pink to craft the ultimate starter home that she'll never want to leave.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: After moving 20 times in 28 years, a couple is ready to make the move into a recently purchased Victorian their last. The rooms are a hash of renovations past, so Dave and Jenny Marrs help turn this house into a modern home where they'll want to stay.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: When Jenny's parents decided to make the move to Bentonville, Arkansas, from Florida, the Marrs were thrilled to have them closer, but after months of living under the same roof, it's time for Joan and Steve to have a fabulous dream home of their own.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: A woman made an offer on a 1902 house, and her husband thinks it’s too outdated. Dave and Jenny work to renovate it while preserving its original charm.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: A couple is ready to move out of his parent's home and start a new life with their baby right next door. Building on sentimental property is an exciting task for Brian and Mika, but first they'll have to clear a lot filled with decades of collectibles.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: A couple bought their dream property years ago but are living with his mother due to financial setbacks. The family is ready to build a home of their own, but Brian and Mika must find a way to combine her understated style with his over-the-top taste.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: A fun-loving couple is tired of squeezing into their Brooklyn apartment, so they're making a big move closer to family in Florida. She wants something edgy while he prefers to play it safe, and Brian and Mika must help them decide on a design remotely.

programme.desc: A couple loves to host both their Italian and Indian families, but doing it in their small house with too many walls is difficult. Ty Pennington and Alison Victoria have to learn to work together as they find a solution for this overwhelmed family.

programme.desc: A couple looks to upgrade and find a home with serious wow factor in Phoenix. They're searching for a place with a pool and a great outdoor space for entertaining, and Steven wants a fixer that can build equity, but Bobby prefers something move-in ready.

programme.title: Good Eats

programme.title: Good Eats
programme.desc: Eggs Benedict is king of the brunch, so Alton rebuilds a 'Good Eats' version.

programme.title: Good Eats
programme.desc: Alton resuscitates the languishing tradition of the 'icebox' or 'refrigerator' cake. These no-bake cakes were all the rage in the 1950s, but they’re ready for a pastry redux.

programme.title: Good Eats
programme.desc: Learn to make the perfect grilled chicken.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Mexico City has the most people of any city in the western hemisphere, and they all love to eat. Home to some of the best street food on Earth, Andrew Zimmern explores tasty traditions like barbacoa, chicharrone and huarache.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: In Poland's capital city of Warsaw, the Slavic culture is rich and the hearty food sticks with you through the winter. From pierogi to zapiekanka to paczki, Andrew Zimmern explores the iconic eats that Poles hold as tradition.

programme.title: The Zimmern List
programme.desc: Andrew heads to Pittsburgh where new restaurants are building on old culinary traditions. He tries a vegan twist on pierogies, checks out the newest wave of local chef talent at the Smallman Galley and indulges in classic dishes from Spain.

programme.title: The Zimmern List
programme.desc: Andrew takes us around the world as he eats his way through Queens, NY. He digs into a monster Mexican sandwich, samples some of New York's best Egyptian cuisine and feasts on Argentine meats and authentic Taiwanese fare.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern shares a tour of the Iowa State Fair, one of the largest and best known state fairs in the U.S. A gastronomic trip through the 445-acre fairgrounds reveals fresh, locally grown sweet corn, baked sausage cavatelli and Dutch letter pastries.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew introduces the tropical and frenetic coastal cuisine of Guayaquil, Ecuador. Bright flavours and local ingredients define their gastronomy, and Andrew tries everything from red mangrove crab to a plantain dumpling studded with crispy pork.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Bangkok, Thailand, has so many culinary treasures, it deserves a second trip! From steamed whole bass to massaman curry, Andrew highlights the city's exotic flavors and meals that are meant to be shared.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations

programme.desc: Roger Mooking is scouring the country for fiery fresh takes on the beloved classic combination, surf and turf.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: Residents of Guffey, Colorado cherish their tiny mountain outpost for one reason - the peaceful Rocky Mountain surroundings. That peace is shattered one January night when Carl and JoAnna Dutcher are massacred alongside their grandson, Tony.

programme.title: True Crime With Aphrodite Jones
programme.desc: A beloved small town city worker is gunned down at work.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Many stories don't end when the jury delivers its verdict. Three amazing cases where the quest for justice rages on.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Police must retrace a teenager's last known movements if they hope to find out when and where she crossed paths with her killer.

programme.title: Extreme Measures
programme.desc: A Southern California college freshman is gunned down in her family's home, and her older sister won't rest until she finds the people responsible.

programme.title: Man With a Van
programme.desc: Meredith Emerson decides to celebrate the new year by hiking on Georgia's Blood Mountain with her dog, Ella. When Meredith goes missing and Ella is found 60 miles away, an all-out search begins.

programme.title: Highway to Hell
programme.desc: Truck driver Bob Nelson is a week from completing his final cross-country ride before returning to his family and celebrating his 25th wedding anniversary. When he fails to show, cops discover his abandoned truck and a crime scene that raises questions.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: It's a brutal scene when Karen Gregory is raped and stabbed in her boyfriend's Florida home. Detective Larry Tosi enlists the help of his firefighter friend to solve the crime. What comes next is something no detective wants to hear.

programme.title: The 1990s: The Deadliest Decade
programme.desc: Pvt. Tracie McBride has just arrived for military intelligence training when she's kidnapped from a laundry room at Goodfellow Air Force Base in Texas. A hunt for the missing soldier leads to a tale of horror involving a decorated war vet.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: When Billings, Montana firefighters respond to a duplex consumed in flames, two bound and gagged bodies are found inside. With their housemate nowhere to be found, police aren't sure if they're searching for the killer or another victim.

programme.title: Murder Decoded
programme.desc: After motorists spot a man's body burning on the side of the highway, investigators find evidence of a brutal assassination and fiery cover-up. Detectives decode construction debris with curious details to reveal a scheme that ended in murder.

programme.title: Murder Calls
programme.desc: When a young mother is shot dead in front of her son, horrified witnesses call 911 and describe the shooter as a slender man who disappeared into nearby trees. Though clues are scarce, investigators finally uncover the killer's shocking identity.

programme.title: The Devil Speaks
programme.desc: Billy Staton and his fiancé Leticia Castro vanish without a trace. Have they left town and eloped? The discovery of Billy's burnt out car and a shock confession, reveal a web of lies that only a secret recording can untangle the truth.

programme.title: In Pursuit with John Walsh
programme.desc: John follows the trail of fugitive Leroy Headley whose 911 call sends police down a dark and twisting path that unravels a history of violence. Cal uncovers hidden truths behind the case of Jeffrey Forrest, a dangerous sexual predator on the run.

programme.title: The Killer Beside Me
programme.desc: Gayle Isleib was shot on April 30, 1996. Police identify a co-worker, Tyronne Montgomery. Evidence is found of stalking, plans to kidnap Gayle, murder her husband and love poems to Gayle. Tyrone Montgomery was convicted of 1st degree Murder.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: These Deadly Women take the wedding vow 'till death do us part' seriously; they make sure their marriages are "Fatal Ties.

programme.title: Obsession: Dark Desires
programme.desc: Excited about a fresh start, young single mom Savannah and her son move to a new neighbourhood. When her seemingly friendly next-door neighbor offers her help, she has no idea that a dangerous obsession will grow on the other side of her wall.

programme.title: Murder in the Middle
programme.desc: A young woman is found dead on the kitchen floor of her family's home.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Julie Bowling stares down death every day as a cancer therapist and part-time funeral home worker. When she's killed while her husband is out of town, the focus turns to his secret life and shaky finances.

programme.title: Wicked Attraction
programme.desc: In November 2009, Bo McNeely hitches a ride with C.J. Harvey at a truck stop. The two become fast friends. But when Harvey takes Bo home to his wife and their four boys, Bo realizes he's stepped into a meth den and the visit spirals out of control.

programme.title: Southern Fried Homicide
programme.desc: Columbia Kentucky is the perfect place to raise a family, nestled quietly away form the hustle and bustle of city life. But, for one family, darkness is seeping in threatening to destroy their peaceful lives and answers will be a long time coming.

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: An innocent trip to the store ends in tragedy when the body of Linda Strait is found along the Spokane River. But with no eyewitnesses, detectives have their work cut out for them. They'll spend the rest of their careers searching for the ruthless killer.

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: After 32-year-old Mark Mueller's body is pulled from the shore of Lake Michigan, police wonder how his favorite fishing spot became a scene for murder. It's not until his burned-out car is found miles away that officers finally get some answers.

programme.title: Southern Gothic
programme.desc: The community of Bowling Green, Kentucky is devastated when a student is assaulted and burned in her college dorm room. After the victim succumbs to her injuries without naming her attacker, police find two suspects with very different stories.

programme.title: Homicide City: Charlotte
programme.desc: Single mother of two, Kenyadda Patterson, works two jobs and goes to college at night in addition to raising her children. When she is discovered murdered, detectives hunt down the killer, and discover he's closer to her than they could imagine.

programme.title: Deadly Secrets
programme.desc: When a serial arsonist murders four people in a California hardware store, fire investigators Marvin Casey and John Orr both become obsessed with the case. As fires continue to burn across the state, the two are pushed to their limits to stop the killing.

programme.title: Deadly Sins
programme.desc: Sloth, lust, and wrath transform a homely housewife into a walking nightmare, terrorizing everyone around her and killing those in her care. And later, a lying, lazy house husband turns the perfect suburban life into a living hell.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: The killer of a young North Carolina woman keeps police guessing until he slips up and detectives get what they need to put him behind bars.

programme.title: Evil Twins
programme.desc: Identical twins Roman and Ruslan Glukhoy are high school wrestling champions with a bright future in professional sports. But when a freak accident shatters their dreams, they follow a path to death and destruction with blood on their hands.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: Police are confronted with a grisly Valentine's Day surprise when a bullet-riddled body is found in a family home; with the usual suspects all sporting alibis, detectives follow a trail of secrets, manipulation and betrayal to arrive at the truth.

programme.title: Relatively Evil
programme.desc: A picture-perfect marriage ends with a horrific murder.While the killer puts the blame on cold medicine, investigators suspect a different diagnosis.

programme.title: Impact of Murder
programme.desc: It was an ordinary day at Chardon High School in Ohio, full of the fights, laughs and boisterous behaviour that fill the corridors of any high school. But all that changes when one young man shows up with violence on his mind.

programme.title: The Shadows of Death
programme.desc: When Pastor Remington is gunned down in broad daylight at his church in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, police launch a massive manhunt to stop the shooter before he strikes again. Across town, the Odom family fear their own missing son is in grave danger.

programme.title: Raw Terror
programme.desc: Ross Reisner was enjoying an evening with his partner Kevin when bullets flew through the window of their Long Island home. Kevin was injured but Ross died in Kevin's arms. The police hunted a former friend of the couple who fled across state lines.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: Cindy Albrecht, the head chef for one of the racing world's top teams, goes missing from her home near the INDY 500 and as the suspects start piling up it becomes a race against time.

programme.desc: Rap star Corey 'C-Murder' Miller was convicted of killing one of his fans after a fight broke out at a crowded nightclub. Chris Anderson and Fatima Silva have been called in by C-Murder's family to uncover the truth.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Crosley Green was convicted of killing a man in 1990, largely on the testimony of the man’s ex-girlfriend who said 'a black guy stepped out with a gun.' There was no physical evidence, and a judge overturned the conviction, yet Green remains in prison.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: Experts investigate if there's any truth to conspiracy theories that allege secret societies control the course of world history from behind-the scenes, and if true, new discoveries might finally reveal the extent of their global domination.

programme.title: Forbidden History

programme.title: Forbidden History

programme.title: Forbidden History
